items.content_html: A lightweight, modern, extendable dom library, written in typescript!
items.title: juetan/anselector: A lightweight, modern, extendable dom library, written in typescript!

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library that provides reactivity and data-binding for DOM elements. It allows you to create reactive state objects that automatically update the DOM when the state changes, making it easy to implement dynamic and interactive UIs.
items.title: Furqaaan/papadam: A lightweight JavaScript library that provides reactivity and data-binding for DOM elements. It allows you to create reactive state objects that automatically update the DOM when the state changes, making it easy to implement dynamic and interactive UIs.

items.content_html: A JavaScript package for generating league tables from match data, with customizable sorting options and detailed explanations of tiebreaker application available in both text and raw data formats.
items.title: SuzuSuzu-HaruHaru/league-standings: A JavaScript package for generating league tables from match data, with customizable sorting options and detailed explanations of tiebreaker application available in both text and raw data formats.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for making images draggable on a web page, with seamless Drupal integration.
items.title: michaelbrownjr/draggable-image: A lightweight JavaScript library for making images draggable on a web page, with seamless Drupal integration.

items.content_html: A lightweight, efficient syntax highlighting library with zero runtime dependencies

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.
items.title: leoneldonati/livio-web: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.
